alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 10:25PM CDT until July 01 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU AND NORTHWESTERN ROLETTE COUNTIES... At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Bottineau, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dunseith around 1055 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pelican Point State Recreation Area, Homen State Forest and Butte St. Paul State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
